headlines.shortLinkText: Boqvist scores go-ahead goal as Cup champ Panthers beat Blackhawks 3-2 on banner-raising night

events.name: Pittsburgh Penguins at New York Rangers

headlines.description: — Justin Brazeau scored twice, Arturs Silovs stopped all 25 shots he faced for his first regular-season NHL shutout, and the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the New York Rangers 3-0 on Tuesday night in each team's opener.
headlines.shortLinkText: Penguins beat Mike Sullivan's Rangers 3-0 in coach Dan Muse's debut

events.name: Colorado Avalanche at Los Angeles Kings

headlines.description: — Martin Necas scored two goals, Nathan MacKinnon had two assists to become the leading scorer in Avalanche history, and Colorado opened the regular season with a 4-1 victory over the Los Angeles Kings on Tuesday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Martin Necas scores 2 goals, and the Avalanche rout the Kings 4-1 in a dominant season opener
